TestDescription.name: Apache 2.x version older than 2.2.9

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description:
[coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break][bold]Fixed in Apache httpd 2.2.9:[/bold][break][ul]
[li] [bold]low[/bold]: mod_proxy_balancer CSRF CVE-2007-6420[break]
The mod_proxy_balancer provided an administrative interface that could be vulnerable to cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks.
[/li]
[li] [bold]moderate[/bold]: mod_proxy_http DoS CVE-2008-2364[break]
A flaw was found in the handling of excessive interim responses from an origin server when using mod_proxy_http. A remote attacker could cause a denial of service or high memory usage.
[/li]
[/ul][break]
[navy]Affected Apache versions (2.2.8, 2.2.6, 2.2.5, 2.2.4, 2.2.3, 2.2.2, 2.2.0).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: Check references for details about every vulnerability.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache 2.x to the latest version.
